<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Anomaly Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/anomalies/settings/{policyid}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Updates anomaly settings for the policy with the specified ID.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3
